# Data process

## Finland

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `q1010_birth_date` |
|----------|------------|
| **Label** | `birth date (day, month, year)` |
| **Table name** | `Courage_Finland_w1` |
| **Description** |  |


```{r assign_fin, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'COURAGE_fin_w1_birth','Courage.Courage_Finland_w1',
                         variables=list('q1010_birth_date'), missings = TRUE)
COURAGE_fin_w1_birth <- opal.execute(o,'COURAGE_fin_w1_birth')
```
**R script:**

```{r pref1}
COURAGE_fin_w1_birth$dbirth <- as.numeric(format(COURAGE_fin_w1_birth$q1010_birth_date, '%d'))

```

```{r local_fin, echo=F}

vari <- COURAGE_fin_w1_birth$dbirth
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = "dbirth") 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(COURAGE_fin_w1_birth, aes(dbirth)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
The harmonized variable is the same than the study-specific variable, but the missing values have to be recoded as follows:

* `NA into 999`


**R script:**

```{r harmo_fin}
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_fin_w1_birth$id)
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$dbirth <- car::recode(COURAGE_fin_w1_birth$dbirth, "NA=999")
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$dbirth <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$dbirth, labels = c("Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistics of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript_fin, echo=F}
vari <- COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$dbirth
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1, aes(dbirth)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab("Day of birth") + ylab("Frequency") + xlim(1,31)
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation_fin, echo=F}
```





```{r importOPAL_fin, echo=F}

#opal.assign.data(o, 'COURAGE_ds_fin_w1', COURAGE_ds_fin_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'COURAGE_ds_fin_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')

COURAGE_m_ds_fin_w1 <- COURAGE_ds_fin_w1
COURAGE_m_ds_fin_w1$dbirth <- car::recode(COURAGE_m_ds_fin_w1$dbirth, "c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997,998, 999)=NA")
```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves




```{r summ, echo=F}

l.hds <- list(fin_w1 = COURAGE_ds_fin_w1, pol_w1 = COURAGE_ds_pol_w1, pol_w2 = COURAGE_ds_pol_w2, spain_w1 = COURAGE_ds_spain_w1, spain_w2 = COURAGE_ds_spain_w2)
m.hds <- list()
ln.hds <- list(fin_w1 = "Finland w1", pol_w1 = "Poland w1", pol_w2 = "Poland w2", spain_w1 = "Spain w1", spain_w2 = "Spain w2")

for(name in names(l.hds)) {
  aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cont_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cont_label)
  m_name <- paste0("COURAGE_m_ds_",name)
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  m.hds[[name]] <- get(paste0("COURAGE_m_ds_",name))
  rm(aux_object)
}

t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[1]][2])[1:6]
t.hds <- substr(t.summ,1,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)-1)
for (i in seq_along(l.hds)){
  t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[i]][2])[1:6]
  t.hds <- cbind(t.hds,as.numeric(substr(t.summ,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)+1,nchar(t.summ))))
}
t.hds <- rbind(t.hds,c("sample size", sapply(l.hds,function(wave) length(wave[[1]]))))

dimnames(t.hds)[[2]] <- c(dimnames(summary(m.hds[[1]][2]))[[2]],sapply(names(l.hds),function(wname) ln.hds[[wname]]))
kable(t.hds,caption=ds_label)



```
